channel.title: Mass-mailing
channel.description: How can i disable mass-mailing on Vbulletin? cos my site got suspened on 000webhost for mass-mailing :s

item.title: Mass-mailing
item.dc:creator: @TrebaurLul TrebaurLul
item.description:
@TrebaurLul wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:3, topic:347252”][quote author=PvP is My Game link=topic=443630.msg3257505#msg3257505 date=1278228993]
How can i disable mass-mailing on Vbulletin? cos my site got suspened on 000webhost for mass-mailing :s
[/quote]000webhost blows. If you’re willing to spend 100 dollars on vBulletin I suggest you buy a premium webhost.[/quote]

That’s the thing, it’s most likely nulled.

@PvP is My Game

I’m not accusing you of owning nulled software such as vBulletin, but if you do, I would recommend an off shore host such as a webhost located in Netherlands or Sweden. These webhosts can be found everywhere, just Google it. If it’s a licensed version of vBulletin and you actual purchased it, I would recommend JustHost for you, it has amazing offers and 99.9% uptime.

Read full topic

item.title: Mass-mailing
item.dc:creator: @TrebaurLul TrebaurLul
item.description:
@TrebaurLul wrote:

PvP is My Game:

How can i disable mass-mailing on Vbulletin? cos my site got suspened on 000webhost for mass-mailing :s

I should tell you first that using a free webhost like 000webhost is a very bad idea. My current webhost is about $100 a year and has unlimited space and bandwidth. I would recommend if you are going to use vBulletin, buy a paid webhost that allows you to send emails out to multiple people. Free webhosts suspect you are spamming.

You can talk to 000webhost and ask them to unsuspend you site in a ticket but other then that you can’t do much.

I don’t own a vBulletin license so I don’t know the features such as disabling this but as I said above, you wouldn’t have to worry about that with a paid webhost.

Read full topic
